mapper.sql: id, uid, num_sc, num_yx, num_tc, num_jx, num_dh, num_sx, ssc, ktc, aqzt, zyfzr, aqcnsj, del, ctime
mapper.insert: insert into fc_promise_t (id, uid, num_sc, num_yx, num_tc, num_jx, num_dh, num_sx, ssc, ktc, aqzt, zyfzr, aqcnsj, del, ctime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numSc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numYx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numTc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numJx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numDh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numSx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ssc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ktc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zyfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aqcnsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update fc_promise_t
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_sc = #{numSc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_yx = #{numYx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_tc = #{numTc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_jx = #{numJx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_dh = #{numDh,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num_sx = #{numSx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ssc = #{ssc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ktc = #{ktc,jdbcType=INTEGER},
aqzt = #{aqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zyfzr = #{zyfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aqcnsj = #{aqcnsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fc_promise_t set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_sc = #{numSc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_yx = #{numYx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_tc = #{numTc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_jx = #{numJx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_dh = #{numDh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num_sx = #{numSx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ssc = #{ssc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ktc = #{ktc,jdbcType=INTEGER}, aqzt = #{aqzt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zyfzr = #{zyfzr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aqcnsj = #{aqcnsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del = #{del,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from fc_promise_t where del=0 AND uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by ctime DESC

select
from fc_promise_t where del = 0 and uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ctime >= date(now()) and ctime < DATE_ADD(date(now()),INTERVAL 1 DAY) order by ctime DESC

select
from fc_promise_t where del=0 AND uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND DATE_FORMAT(ctime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') order by ctime DESC

SELECT T1.uid, T1.del,T3.name,count(T1.uid) num FROM fc_promise_t T1 LEFT JOIN trade_company_tbl T2 ON T1.uid = T2.uid LEFT JOIN company_view T3 ON T2.uid = T3.user_id where T1.del = 0 and T1.uid is not null and T2.tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by T1.uid

SELECT T1.uid, T1.del,T3.name,count(T1.uid) TotalNum,IFNULL(T4.num,0) MonthNum FROM fc_promise_t T1 LEFT JOIN trade_company_tbl T2 ON T1.uid = T2.uid LEFT JOIN company_view T3 ON T2.uid = T3.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT uid,count(uid) num FROM fc_promise_t WHERE del = 0 AND uid is not null AND DATE_FORMAT(ctime, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') ) T4 ON T3.user_id = T4.uid where T1.del = 0 and T1.uid is not null and T2.tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by T1.uid
